documentation.text: @dev Maps underlying token addresses to `PriceOracle` contracts (can be `BasePriceOracle` contracts too).
@dev The administrator of this `MasterPriceOracle`.
@dev Controls if `admin` can overwrite existing assignments of oracles to underlying tokens.

documentation.text: @dev Attempts to return the price in ETH of `underlying` (implements `BasePriceOracle`).

changeAdmin(address).details: Changes the admin and emits an event.

params._admin: The admin who can assign oracles to underlying tokens.
params._canAdminOverwrite: Controls if `admin` can overwrite existing assignments of oracles to underlying tokens.
params._oracles: The `PriceOracle` contracts to be assigned to `underlyings`.
params.underlyings: The underlying ERC20 token addresses to link to `_oracles`.

getUnderlyingPrice(address).details: Implements the `PriceOracle` interface for Fuse pools (and Compound v2).

returns._0: Price in ETH of the token underlying `cToken`, scaled by `10 ** (36 - underlyingDecimals)`.

price(address).details: Attempts to return the price in ETH of `underlying` (implements `BasePriceOracle`).

canAdminOverwrite.details: Controls if `admin` can overwrite existing assignments of oracles to underlying tokens.

oracles.details: Maps underlying token addresses to `PriceOracle` contracts (can be `BasePriceOracle` contracts too).

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Returns the price in ETH of the token underlying `cToken`.

userdoc.notice: Use a combination of price oracles.
